body_html:
Hi,
I have a question regarding the mnist_replica.py program.
If I use only one machine (localhost) and set internally multiple workers everything runs fine.
But if I want to use e.g. 2 worker running on different machines only the worker with index 0 runs through (does not wait for the other worker with index 1) and the worker with index 1 complains about global Variables not set.
I hope you can point me in the right direction!
body_text:

body:
Hi,
I have a question regarding the mnist_replica.py program. 
If I use only one machine (localhost) and set internally multiple workers everything runs fine. 
But if I want to use e.g. 2 worker running on different machines only the worker with index 0 runs through (does not wait for the other worker with index 1) and the worker with index 1 complains about global Variables not set.
I hope you can point me in the right direction!
